meanings.definition: A place where dead bodies are buried.
meanings.sent1: The old church had a small graveyard behind it.
meanings.sent2: People visit graveyards to pay their respects to loved ones.
meanings.sent3: I heard a ghost joke about a skeleton who lived in a graveyard.
meanings.sent4: The graveyard was a silent city of the departed.
meanings.sent5: The graveyard at night was eerie and filled with shadows.

meanings.sent1: The graveyard was well-maintained with beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Many families have plots in the local graveyard.
meanings.sent3: The graveyard was so peaceful, it felt like a sanctuary.
meanings.sent4: The graveyard stretched out like a sleeping giant under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The graveyard held the memories of generations past.
